actions.name: AddCaseComment
actions.description: Grants permission to add a comment to a support case

actions.name: CheckCasePermission
actions.description: Grants permission to verify whether the caller has the permissions to perform support case operations

actions.name: CompleteMultipartUpload
actions.description: Grants permission to complete a multipart file upload to a support case

actions.name: CreateCase
actions.description: Grants permission to create a support case

actions.name: CreateS3CLIUploadCommand
actions.description: Grants permission to create a cli command to allow a file upload to a support case

actions.name: CreateS3DownloadUrl
actions.description: Grants permission to download a file from a support case

actions.name: GetCase
actions.description: Grants permission to describe a support case in your account

actions.name: GetCasePermission
actions.description: Grants permission to verify whether the caller has the permissions to perform support case operations

actions.name: GetCases
actions.description: Grants permission to list the support cases in your account

actions.name: GetUICache
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve cached case user data for use in the Console

actions.name: ListTagsForCase
actions.description: Grants permission to list tags on a support case

actions.name: StartMultipartUpload
actions.description: Grants permission to start a multipart file upload to a support case

actions.name: TagCase
actions.description: Grants permission to add a tag on a support case

actions.name: UntagCase
actions.description: Grants permission to remove a tag on a support case

actions.name: UpdateCase
actions.description: Grants permission to update a support case

actions.name: UpdateCaseStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to update a support case status

actions.name: UpdateMultipartUpload
actions.description: Grants permission to update a multipart file upload to a support case
